item.title: Edx - HarvardX PH125 1x Data Science R Basics
item.description: Resources Most of the instructor’s course contents from different courses is available in the book : <2018-02-04 Sun> Data scientist Toolbox : link <2018-02-04 Sun> R-Bloggers link <2018-02-04 Sun> Section 1: R Basics, Functions, Data types R was developed by statisticians and data analysts as an interactive environment for data analysis. It is not like C or Java. R is free and Open source. Runs on all major platforms.
